name: Git extended update-index
description:
Enables support for the next git commands:

git update-index
  • --skip-worktree
  • --no-skip-worktree
  • --chmod=+x
  • --chmod=-x
notes:
Release 0.0.5:
  • run the commands in a background task (fixes the exception).

Release 0.0.4:
  • switched to modern IntelliJ API;
  • set Java 11 as compile target;
  • use the latest Kotlin compiler.

Release 0.0.3:
  • rewrote the plugin in Kotlin;
  • switched to modern IntelliJ API;
  • added a plugin icon.

Release 0.0.2:
  • Update dependencies to make the plugin available on all platforms.

Release 0.0.1:
  • Initial release.
